```{r}
library(readr)
library(tidyverse)
library(dplyr) 
library(readr)
library(ggplot2)
```

```{r}
us_18Q1 <- read_csv("us_18Q1.csv")

eighteen <- us_18Q1 %>% 
  filter(DEM_AGE10 == 1,
         DEM_COLLEGE == 1,
         DEM_STDNT == 1) %>% 
  select(FENT_USE:DIHY_NMU)

#opioid use
eighteen %>% 
  replace(is.na(.), 0) %>% 
  summarise_all(funs(sum)) %>% 
  pivot_longer(cols = FENT_USE:DIHY_NMU,
               names_to = "drug",
               values_to = "num") %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x = num, y = drug)) +
  geom_col()
```
